content: Yes, having a clear and strong vision can definitely help establish your authority as a filmmaker, even if you are not yet established in the industry. When you have a well-thought-out vision, it can inspire confidence in your team and make it easier for everyone to work towards a common goal. However, it's also important to remain flexible and open to changes, as unexpected things can happen during the filmmaking process. Finding a balance between having a clear vision and being adaptable is key to success as a filmmaker.
